search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Hibob (hibob.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Hibob is: [https://www.hibob.com/pricing/](https://www.hibob.com/pricing/).
